DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare 2-hour PPBG excursion follow standard test meal insulin-requiring diabetic patient treat twice daily human insulin mix 50/50 , versus 2-hour PPBG excursion patient treat twice daily insulin lispro mix 50/50 .
DOC.brief_title: Local Registration Trial China Humalog Mix 50
DOC.mesh_term: Isophane insulin , insulin lispro drug combination 50:50
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman either type 1 type 2 diabetes ( World Health Organization [ WHO ] classification ) least 2 month age 18 70 ( inclusive ) signing informed consent . 2 . Have treat commercially available human insulin mix 50/50 human insulin mix 30/70 twice daily pharmacological treatment diabetes least 2 month prior enter study . 3 . Have HbA1c 1.1 1.7 time upper limit normal reference rang ( inclusive ) determine local laboratory within 2 week prior Visit 1 . 4 . Have achieve compliance diet insulin therapy determine investigator perform regular blood glucose monitoring . 5 . Have give informed consent participate study accordance local regulation . { 1 ] Have use oral antidiabetic agent , include biguanides , sulfonylurea , glucosidase inhibitor , insulinsensitivity enhancer within 30 day prior entry study . [ 2 ] Receive total daily dose insulin > 2 units/kg . [ 3 ] Have two episode severe hypoglycemia ( define require assistance another person due disable hypoglycemia ) within 6 month prior entry study . [ 4 ] Have body mass index > 35 kg/m2 . [ 5 ] Have serum creatinine > upper limit normal ( ULN ) , determine local laboratory .
